Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Retro-[K6,8L9]Ind (Synthetic AMPs, retro-indolicidin analog, XXA, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: sequence reversal, sequence shuffling, designed, man-made sequences

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is 76.92% similar toretro-indolicidin. K=P: 23%, L=W=R: 15%.Activity: Active against Gram+ B. subtilis IFO 3513 (MIC 12.5 ug/ml), S. aureus IFO 12732 (MIC 12.5 ug/ml), and Gram- E. coli IFO 12734 (MIC 50 ug/ml).In vitro toxicity: 7% hemolysis relative to 50 uM Ind at 100% hemolysis after 0.5 h.Structure:  CD spectrum in methanol available (see ref).

Literature Information.Title: Structure-function relationships in the tryptophan-rich, antimicrobial peptide indolicidin.
